level.heading: Abolishment of the Department of Human Rights and Local Business Development.
level.text: Pursuant to ยง 1-204.04(b), the Council hereby abolishes the Department of Human Rights and Local Business Development, established under Reorganization Plan No. 1 of 1989, effective November 1, 1989. The Department of Human Rights and Local Business Development is abolished as of October 1, 1999.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of subchapter IV, see notes following ยง 2-1411.01.
